text: in the Kips Bay neighborhood of
Manhattan a new experimental building
could solve the housing problem for
millions of New Yorkers they're called
micro apartments in New York City of
micro unit is a unit that's smaller than
four hundred square feet the biggest
unit in Carmel place is only 360 square
feet and the smallest is just 260 the
apartments come with everything a busy
New Yorker would need including a
microwave two burner stove small
refrigerator and even a dishwasher city
wanted to test the waters with this
building and see how people would live
in it how long they stayed how much they
enjoyed this type of design because it
hasn't been built for decades in the
city building the apartments was a
challenge in engineering as the units
were prefabricated in Brooklyn
once the units were complete they were
trucked into Manhattan and installed one
on top of the other by crane this type
of modular building is typically cheaper
than traditional construction and often
safer when compared to the average
studio rental in Manhattan these tiny
apartments come with a big price tag
between twenty-five and twenty nine
hundred dollars a month but prices for
micro apartments like these should come
down in the future helping to create
more affordable living spaces for
everyone
